scripts.local: npm run prebuild && npm run sw-precache && ng serve --deploy-url /tools/ --environment=local
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run sw-precache && ng serve -w --deploy-url /tools/ --environment=dev --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.stage: npm run prebuild && npm run sw-precache && ng serve --deploy-url /tools/ --environment=stage --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.prod: npm run prebuild && npm run sw-precache && ng serve --deploy-url /tools/ --environment=prod --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.standalone-ws: npm run prebuild && npm run sw-precache && ng serve --deploy-url /tools/ --environment=docker --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.build:stage: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing none --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=stage && npm run sw-precache:copy-to-dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && ng build --aot --output-hashing none --base-href /tools/ --target=development --environment=dev && npm run sw-precache:copy-to-dist
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && ng build --aot --output-hashing none --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=prod && npm run sw-precache:copy-to-dist
scripts.build:docker: npm run prebuild && ng build --aot --output-hashing none --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=docker && npm run sw-precache:copy-to-dist
scripts.sw-precache:copy-to-dist: npm run sw-precache && mkdirp dist/tools && cp service-worker.js dist/tools/
scripts.start:blue: npm run build:prod && mkdir -p logs && forever start -l forever.log -o logs/out.log -e logs/error.log -a -p logs --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 1000 ./node_modules/.bin/ws -d dist -p 3001 --rewrite '/assets/fonts/* -> /tools/assets/fonts/$1' '/assets/images/* -> /tools/assets/images/$1' '/tools/bubbles -> /tools/' '/tools/map -> /tools/' '/tools/mountain -> /tools/'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run start:local-web-server
scripts.ncu-vizabi: ncu -u vizabi vizabi-barrankchart vizabi-bubblechart vizabi-bubblemap vizabi-config-systema_globalis vizabi-linechart vizabi-mountainchart vizabi-popbyage vizabi-ws-reader && npm i && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(package): update vizabis'
